Quote: I thought the force of my wanting must wake ye, surely. And then ye did come. . ."He stopped, looking at me with eyes gone soft and dark. "Christ, Claire, ye were so beautiful, there on the stair, wi' your hair down and the shadow of your body with the light behind yeâ€¦."He shook his head slowly. "I did think I should die, if I didna have ye,"he said softly. "Just then.
Author: Diana Gabaldon
